channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Palantir and Anduril reportedly building a tech consortium to bid on defense contracts
item.description: Two big defense tech players, Palantir and Anduril, are talking to tech companies including SpaceX, OpenAI, Saronic, and Scale AI about forming a cons...

item.title: Sriram Krishnan named Trump’s senior policy advisor for AI
item.description: Incoming president Donald Trump has confirmed reports that Sriram Krishnan, until recently a general partner at Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), will serve...

item.title: 9 Best French Presses (2024): Plastic, Glass, Stainless Steel, Travel
item.description: The humble French press is affordable, effective, and hard to mess up. Here are our favorites to make your morning cup of coffee.

item.title: The Invisible Russia-Ukraine Battlefield
item.description: In Russia’s war against Ukraine, electronic warfare, including signal-jamming, anti-drone weapons, and innovative protections for critical military sy...

item.title: How to Change the Default Search Engine in Google Chrome
item.description: Just because you use Chrome doesn’t mean you have to use Google. Learn how to invite Bing, DuckDuckGo, Brave, or even ChatGPT into your omnibox.

item.title: AI Agents Will Be Manipulation Engines
item.description: Surrendering to algorithmic agents risks putting us under their influence.

item.title: X jacks up Premium+ prices by 37.5%, hits some markets harder
item.description: X is raising prices for its top-tier subscription service, Premium+, by 37.5% to $22 a month, marking the largest price increase since Elon Musk bough...

item.title: Trump says he wants to keep TikTok around ‘for a little while’
item.description: With a US TikTok ban scheduled to take effect in less than a month, President-elect Donald Trump said Sunday that he’d like to keep the app around, ac...

item.title: xAI is testing a standalone iOS app for its Grok chatbot
item.description: Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, is testing out a standalone iOS app for its chatbot, Grok, which was available only to X users until now. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: L’Oreal Professionnel AirLight Pro Review: Faster, Lighter, and Repairable
item.description: L'Oréal's first professional hair dryer combines infrared light, wind, and heat to drastically reduce your drying time.
